entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023
